headline: Jim Cramer Shares His Dicussion With Micron Technology, Inc. (MU)’s CEO For The Stock
summary: We recently published 10 Stocks Jim Cramer Discussed As He Remained Optimistic About American Ingenuity. Micron Technology, Inc. (NASDAQ:MU) is one of the stocks Jim Cramer recently discussed. Micron Technology, Inc. (NASDAQ:MU) was the special feature of Cramer’s appearance, as he was able to allocate time to it despite being busy covering Corning and Apple […]

headline: Does Intel's New Leadership and AI Push Signal a Strategic Shift for INTC?
summary: Earlier this month, Intel announced a series of senior leadership appointments aimed at strengthening its core product areas, expanding its foundry business, and accelerating engineering excellence, alongside new AI collaborations with Elliptic Labs and a community-focused AI lab launch in Baltimore. By attracting executives with deep AI, engineering, and manufacturing backgrounds from industry leaders like Arm, Cadence, and Micron, Intel is signaling a renewed operational focus while...

headline: Micron (MU) Is Up 19.7% After Analyst Upgrades Driven by Strong AI Data Center Memory Demand
summary: Micron Technology recently attracted heightened analyst optimism after several upgrades cited rising demand for its DRAM and artificial intelligence-focused memory products ahead of its upcoming earnings report on September 23, 2025. A key insight is that Micron’s data center business, fueled by advanced memory for AI applications, has seen its revenue increase by a very large amount year-over-year, helping to shift sentiment and forecasts for the company’s long-term potential. We’ll examine...

headline: Bull of the Day: Micron Technology (MU)
